* Substitute `WorldStatistics`'s `log_playback` with a new message type `LogPlaybackStatistics`, which has extra info about the log.

* Add a view to the `LogPlayWidget` which displays a timeline as the log is playing as shown below:

update.title: Log playback GUI timeline

content.html: Nice. Thanks.

content.html: Oh, sorry for the extra work

content.html: Removed it on 3c72a72, but soon @caguero will add it again when new fields are added to the message.

content.raw:
I checked your branch and most of it looks good, the only problem was that the tick position on the timeline didn't correspond to the time written on the right. I think that's because you got rid of the logic of having a `roundStartTime` different from the real start time. That's needed because the tick times don't display milliseconds. 

So I got ported the main ideas from your branch manually on 3c72a72, let me know if I forgot anything.
content.html:
I checked your branch and most of it looks good, the only problem was that the tick position on the timeline didn't correspond to the time written on the right. I think that's because you got rid of the logic of having a roundStartTime different from the real start time. That's needed because the tick times don't display milliseconds.

So I got ported the main ideas from your branch manually on 3c72a72, let me know if I forgot anything.

content.raw:
A recent logging pull request causes a protobuf warning on homebrew:
~~~
[libprotobuf WARNING google/protobuf/descriptor.cc:5411]
Warning: Unused import: "log_playback_control.proto" imports "time.proto" which is not used.
~~~

The following fixes it:
~~~
diff -r d17649e57bc0 gazebo/msgs/log_playback_control.proto
--- a/gazebo/msgs/log_playback_control.proto	Tue Jun 16 11:09:53 2015 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/msgs/log_playback_control.proto	Tue Jun 16 11:14:27 2015 -0700
@@ -4,8 +4,6 @@
 /// \interface LogPlaybackControl
 /// \brief A message that allows for control of log playback functions.
 
-import "time.proto";
-
 message LogPlaybackControl
 {
   /// \brief Pause/play the log file.
~~~
content.html:
A recent logging pull request causes a protobuf warning on homebrew:

[libprotobuf WARNING google/protobuf/descriptor.cc:5411]
Warning: Unused import: "log_playback_control.proto" imports "time.proto" which is not used.

The following fixes it:

diff -r d17649e57bc0 gazebo/msgs/log_playback_control.proto
--- a/gazebo/msgs/log_playback_control.proto    Tue Jun 16 11:09:53 2015 -0700
+++ b/gazebo/msgs/log_playback_control.proto    Tue Jun 16 11:14:27 2015 -0700
@@ -4,8 +4,6 @@
 /// \interface LogPlaybackControl
 /// \brief A message that allows for control of log playback functions.

-import "time.proto";
-
 message LogPlaybackControl
 {
   /// \brief Pause/play the log file.

content.raw: ok I see thanks. Just checking - is it still possible to set `startTime` to be equal to `endTime`? this is just to avoid a divide by 0 in the calculation below
content.html: ok I see thanks. Just checking - is it still possible to set startTime to be equal to endTime? this is just to avoid a divide by 0 in the calculation below
